title: LOL DESTROYING INTERNET
body:
Ok, so idk if anyone else is having this problem but every single time i go into a lol game my internet cuts out and dosent go back on unless i quit lol.

i have tested around with this alot and all that has come out from it is that my internet just literally stops, and ive been placed into LPQ and its getting really frustrating
please someone help me fix this.

replies.body: This is likely due to a network hardware issue. The same thing happens to me when I use my Ethernet-over-Powerline device because League of Legends uses a series of high-frequency, small-size packets in order to create a more real-time environment for players. If you're connected directly to your router, you may want to consider upgrading your router or requesting a replacement from your Internet Service Provider.
